message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not being too generous yet!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give it all away just yet!
I'm starting to get a bit more serious about getting a good deal. You can do better than this!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give up too much. You're getting close, but not quite there!
You're getting closer, but I'm not ready to give in yet. I'm willing to make a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. You're getting close, but I'm not ready to surrender just yet!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not going to take pity on you. I'm willing to make a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to give in completely!
I'm running out of options, but I'm still holding on to hope. This is my best offer yet, but I'm not sure if it's enough.
